events.message: I have just filed a claim regarding the car accident I was involved in yesterday afternoon on Elm Street.
Your claim related to the vehicle collision has been categorised under Auto Accident and forwarded to the relevant department.
An agent specializing in auto accident claims has been assigned to your case to ensure a smooth resolution process.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and have started processing it as per policy terms.
Please submit your vehicle repair estimates, police report, and photos from the accident to proceed with your claim.
All requested documents including the repair shop invoice and police accident report have been received.
Our investigators have begun reviewing the submitted evidence to verify liability and claim validity.
The investigation concluded confirming fault as per the police report; your claim is moving to the settlement phase.
We have prepared a settlement offer covering all approved damage repairs and associated costs for your review.
Thank you for your prompt response and acceptance of the proposed settlement for your vehicle damages.
Your auto accident claim has been formally approved following acceptance of the settlement terms.
We have issued the payment to cover your vehicle repairs as per the approved settlement agreement.
Your claim has been closed successfully after payment issuance and resolution of all issues.
All claim documents and correspondence have been archived securely for any future reference if needed.
